summary: Represents a fragmented array where every element holds the same value, stored as a per‑thread register within a warp group. The layout pretends to have any user‑specified shape, allowing trivial broadcasting, reshaping, and element‑wise operations with other array layouts.
business_intent: Enable high‑performance, memory‑efficient handling of uniform data across GPU threads by providing a lightweight splat representation that supports broadcasting and shape manipulation without extra storage.
